ComicInfo.Summary:
Death Trap: Eileen Harris must stay alive until her husband, Captain Harris, can reach her and save her from a lunatic.
Hopping Down the Bunny Trail: Three children are taken during an Easter Egg hunt, covered with chocolate, and eaten by the Easter Bunny.
The Midnight Messenger!: Peter Browne sells his soul to stop a hoodlum from destroying his shop.
The Creature of the Park: Something has caused the animals in a park to start killing campers.
ComicInfo.Tags: The Easter Bunny,Abel,Cynthia,Mordred,The Three Witches,Mildred,The House of Secrets
